interface.name: greenisland_applications
interface.description: This interface is used by UI modules interested in tracking running applications, for example a library that expose the list of running applications to a launcher. Only one client can bind this interface at a time.

event.name: registered

description.summary: emitted when an application is registered

event.description: This event is sent when the first window of an application have been created.

event.name: unregistered

description.summary: emitted when an application is unregistered

event.description: This event is sent when the last window of an application have been closed.

event.name: focused

description.summary: emitted when a window that belongs to an application has focused

event.description: This event is sent when a window that belongs to an application has focus.

event.name: unfocused

description.summary: emitted when a window that belongs to an application has lost its focus

event.description: This event is sent when a window that belongs to an application has lost its focus.
